modName: Thieves Guild Armor according original Concept Art
summary: This mod retextures the Thievesguild Armor after the original Concept Art from Bethesda
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description:[/b]
This Mod makes the Thievesguild Armor looks like the original Concept Art drawn by BethesdaSoft. At the moment this is only a replacerversion.

[b]Installation:[/b]
Just place the Data folder into your Skyrim folder.

[b]Future Plans:[/b]
When I got 3dsMax I will maybe too make some mesh changes, to makes this more looking like on the drawing.

[b]Credits:[/b]
MaGlas
And thanks to all the testers, which helped me, making this looking good for more then only my ENB.
author: MaGlas
